verses.verse: The words <S%H1697><s%> of Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hilkiah, <S%H2518><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were in Anathoth <S%H6068><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%>

To whom <S%H834><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amon <S%H526><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> in the thirteenth <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of his reign. <S%H4427><s%>

It came <S%H1961><s%> also in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the end <S%H8552><s%> of the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the carrying away <S%H1540><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> captive in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>
Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Before <S%H2962><s%> I formed <S%H3335><s%> thee in the belly <S%H990><s%> I knew <S%H3045><s%> thee; and before <S%H2962><s%> thou camest forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the womb <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7358><s%> I sanctified <S%H6942><s%> thee, and I ordained <S%H5414><s%> thee a prophet <S%H5030><s%> unto the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> I, Ah, <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD! <S%H3069><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3045><s%> speak: <S%H1696><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H595><s%> am a child. <S%H5288><s%>

But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Say <S%H559><s%> not, <S%H408><s%> I <S%H595><s%> am a child: <S%H5288><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt go <S%H1980><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I shall send <S%H7971><s%> thee, and whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> thee thou shalt speak. <S%H1696><s%>

Be not <S%H408><s%> afraid <S%H3372><s%> of their faces: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am with <S%H854><s%> thee to deliver <S%H5337><s%> thee, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> put forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and touched <S%H5060><s%> <S%H5921><s%> my mouth. <S%H6310><s%> And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have put <S%H5414><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> in thy mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

See, <S%H7200><s%> I have this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> set <S%H6485><s%> thee over <S%H5921><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> the kingdoms, <S%H4467><s%> to root out, <S%H5428><s%> and to pull down, <S%H5422><s%> and to destroy, <S%H6><s%> and to throw down, <S%H2040><s%> to build, <S%H1129><s%> and to plant. <S%H5193><s%>

Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%> Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> seest <S%H7200><s%> thou? <S%H859><s%> And I said, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H589><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> a rod <S%H4731><s%> of an almond tree. <S%H8247><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Thou hast well <S%H3190><s%> seen: <S%H7200><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> will hasten <S%H8245><s%> <S%H5921><s%> my word <S%H1697><s%> to perform <S%H6213><s%> it.

And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me the second time, <S%H8145><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> seest <S%H7200><s%> thou? <S%H859><s%> And I said, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H589><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> a seething <S%H5301><s%> pot; <S%H5518><s%> and the face <S%H6440><s%> thereof is toward <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the north. <S%H6828><s%>

Then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Out of the north <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6828><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> shall break forth <S%H6605><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

For, <S%H3588><s%> lo, <S%H2009><s%> I will call <S%H7121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the families <S%H4940><s%> of the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the north, <S%H6828><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and they shall come, <S%H935><s%> and they shall set <S%H5414><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> at the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the gates <S%H8179><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the walls <S%H2346><s%> thereof round about, <S%H5439><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

And I will utter <S%H1696><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%> against them touching <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their wickedness, <S%H7451><s%> who <S%H834><s%> have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me, and have burned incense <S%H6999><s%> unto other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of their own hands. <S%H3027><s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> therefore gird up <S%H247><s%> thy loins, <S%H4975><s%> and arise, <S%H6965><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee: be not <S%H408><s%> dismayed <S%H2865><s%> at their faces, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> I confound <S%H2865><s%> thee before <S%H6440><s%> them.

For, <S%H589><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have made <S%H5414><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> a defensed <S%H4013><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> and an iron <S%H1270><s%> pillar, <S%H5982><s%> and brazen <S%H5178><s%> walls <S%H2346><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> against the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> against the princes <S%H8269><s%> thereof, against the priests <S%H3548><s%> thereof, and against the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

And they shall fight <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H413><s%> thee; but they shall not <S%H3808><s%> prevail <S%H3201><s%> against thee; for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am with <S%H854><s%> thee, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> thee.
